idea:
Many times, videos are made where a reporter/person asks people basic general knowledge questions that people should know about, but they don’t. The intent of the video is to make people laugh, but it’s not a laughing matter. It shows the level of awareness of today's youth. Being aware of things around you is very important and helps in personal as well as professional growth.

Our startup is about making people learn and making them more aware of things around them. For this, we have launched an app called Ichigo on the Play Store.

Ichigo is an informational app which has short, interesting posts about different genres - from food and nutrition to beauty and fashion, from science and technology to culture and mythology, from business and finance to world affairs, we have it all.

We also post motivational posts to keep your spirit up along with vocabulary and brain teasers to keep you sharp.
name: BLUEBABOON CONSULTANCY PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We are leading handicrafts manufacturers, suppliers and exporters. We are basically situated in Vasai, India and operate throughout the world. Our highly skilled craftsmen are expert in crafting structures using several material including wood, marble, glass, paper, metal, lac and others. Our handicrafts are loved and admired around the world in every location because of the finishing and beauty associated. We basically deal in wood craft, marble painting, marble handicraft and other similar products. Our array of handicrafts in India helps enhance beauty of you living or working place, availing a traditional appearance to that.

idea:

We offer an extensive range of technology services and IT solutions which have proven to solidify and complement our client's business operations. We continue to raise our client’s customer service expectations through innovation and common sense.

Our infrastructure and management solutions are developed based on a strong understanding of our client's business operations. We guarantee our solutions and stand by our recommendations.

“In a simple way, we make your business run better....”

idea:
Vonews Media Private Limited a Digital media startup based out of Mumbai. Presently company is at ideation stage. Service will be popularly branded as Video.news.

Video.news an AI based personalized video news feed as per individual’s interests in order to give news that matters most to the people. We also called it as “ Your Personalised Video App”

Video.news understand that generally people hate watching repeated and exaggerated news on television, so we have made it short and crisp for viewers. People can their favorite and preferable news in less than 1 minute. Our Artificial Intelligence and Machine learning engine helps in building personalised videos news feed as per the interests of the viewers in order to deliver news the way they want and that matters the most.

Video.news provides different Categories of News under one roof- Find the trending news from the world of politics, business, sports, entertainment, technology, fashion, food, travel, health, etc.

Our AI based personalized video news feed as per individual’s interests, makes us different from other app based news media companies.
name: VONEWS MEDIA PRIVATE LIMITED
